sentences.english: Feeling he was not wanted, he walked away looking embarrassed.
sentences.chinese: 他覺得沒趣，只好訕訕地走開了。

sentences.english: He was unable to think up a new trick and went away.
sentences.chinese: 他無法再想出新的花招來，就訕訕地溜走了。

sentences.english: Matthew turned shyly to speak to the child.
sentences.chinese: 馬修訕訕地轉過身去面對那孩子。
